title: Guy Mannering; or, The Astrologer - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The individual gipsy upon whom the character of Meg Merrilies was foundedwas well known about the middle of the last century by the name of JeanGordon, an inhabitant of the village of Kirk Yetholm, in the CheviotHills, adjoining to the English Border.

title: Here and there in the Home Land. England, Scotland and Ireland as seen by a Canadian. ... Profusely illustrated
author: Haight, Canniff.
snippet: The whole country from Berwick onthe east, up the valley of the Tweed, along the CheviotHills, which we see to the right, to Solway Firth in thewest, was at one time held by chiefs who carried on apredatory7 warfare for the sake of spoil or the wantonnessof aggression.
